attributes.action: enable Government to purchase MP's necessary second homes outright and allow expenses for the maintainance of those homes in order that they remain to have  a specific value in real terms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would make the Government the owner of MP's second homes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
